name: Meloetta
author: Megumi Mizutani
flavor_text: Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization method that can control the feelings of those who hear it.

attacks.name: Soprano Wave
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Entrancing Melody
attacks.effect: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.
